Package com.github.yellowstonegames.glyph

Class GlidingGlyph

java.lang.Object
com.github.yellowstonegames.glyph.GlidingGlyph
public class GlidingGlyph extends Object
A single long that a Font can render as a glyph with color and styles, given a location that can smoothly change as a CoordGlider. May optionally have an unchanging or a changing rotation as an AngleGlider, and can adjust its position between-grid-cells using a VectorSequenceGlider. This allows constructing a GlidingGlyph with an existing long as Font uses them, as a char and a String of Font markup (see Font.markupGlyph(char, String, ColorLookup)), or as a char and several optional parameters.

    • ownEmptyMotion

      @Nonnull public final com.github.yellowstonegames.smooth.VectorSequenceGlider ownEmptyMotion
      A VectorSequenceGlider that is empty (has no motions) and belongs to this GlidingGlyph. This is public so external code can use it, but should never be modified. It is here so smallMotion can be easily set to an empty sequence.
